test-case.name: fn-substring-before-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file. Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A Character String" $arg2 = "". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = (). Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBBCCCCC" $arg2 = "BBBBB".

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBB" $arg2 = " ". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = " " $arg2 = "AAAAABBBBB". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-11
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function as an argument of another function (fn:not)- return true.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function as an argument of another function (fn:not) - return true.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-13
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string("A") $arg2 = "A". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-14
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = xs:string("A"). Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-15
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = "a". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "a" $arg2 = "A". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-before" $arg2 = "substring-before". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-beforesubstring-before" $arg2 = "substring-before".

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "****" $arg2 = "***".

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function using numbers as part of the string. Arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "12345" $arg2 = "2345".

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "substring-before" function using "substring-before" backwards. Arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-before" $arg2 = "erofeb-gnirtsbus". Use count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before(())`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before("foo", "oo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "f"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before("tattoo", "attoo") eq "t"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before("tattoo", "tatto") eq ""`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before((), ()) eq ""`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before("a string", "") eq ""`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `substring-before("a string", "not in other") eq ""`.
